name: In The Fighting
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
In the game "In battle" your country will protect the way from enemy ships. At your disposal are several types of cannons, for which a number of forts are assigned.

At the beginning of the battle you have a small stock of ammunition and can not equip all forts on the map with cannon. Therefore, place the guns in the most suitable forts, so as not to miss any enemy. With each destroyed ship, you can leave a stockpile of ammunition, with which you can increase the number of Coast Guard. On each map the location of the forts changes. Thoroughly consider the strategy of placing weapons at the beginning of each level.

Features:

★ achievements;
★ Pleasant graphics;
★ simple operation;
★ Interesting gameplay;
★ Easy music;
★ unforgettable adventures;
★ availability in 2 languages;
★ Two game modes.
